name: SM64 Mario Gets A Face Lift
name_original: SM64 Mario Gets A Face Lift
description:
A recreation of Super Mario 64's start menu where you can interact with Mario's face. See if you can find the secret animation!

Move Face Features: Left mouse click + drag

Reset Face: Right mouse click

Mystery Animation: guess you'll have to figure it out?

This was a small project I worked on for a youtube video so if you are interested in how I made the project, come check out my channel!

https://www.youtube.com/c/SethFunk

CREDITS FOR SOUNDS :

“Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“

The music is a remixed version of the "file select" menu from SM64 that I made using Bosca Ceoil

Some sound effects ripped directly from SM64.
